channel.title: Life - Joe Hutchinson
channel.description: Recent content in Life on Joe Hutchinson

item.title: My 2022 Reading List
item.description: "The medium is the message" as the saying goes. Books reflect the nuanced nature of life and slow things down when the world feels fast.

item.title: My 2021 Reading List
item.description: I don't think I'm alone feeling overwhelmed in today's world. When things get crazy, my favorite way to unwind is with a good book.

item.title: My 2020 Reading List
item.description: I love reading and I wish I did more of it. Here are the books I'm reading (or listening to) to this year.
